creator: jabaliacuatico@yahoo.com.ar
text:
As I always do, I started to Tomcat service manually, then I went to the Tomcat Manager, list my applications. Click in my-app but this time did not work.

This fatal error happens, and there is no reason for it. I did not change anything it all in my jsp or servlets code, neither in the server configuration. 

The Tomcat manager told me that everything was ok, but when I entered the url of my webapp, nothing happened. Just this message in spanish:

GRAVE: Excepción de reserva de espacio para servlet MyServlet.

I stop the Tomcat service and I just turn my computer off. When I turn it on, in this second time, everything was ok. ¿So, what about the fatal error? I will never know.

I think that the only reason for this error is that I did not stop the service, the first time, before turn my computer off. ¿Could it be?

These was the output of the file log on localhost:

text: This is a question for the users list.
